lines.text: Not the side against the law.

[Sees Carrincha reaching to scratch his head, which is actually a stealthy attempt to grab his hidden knife]
Carrincha... leave your fleas alone.

[Believing he's got Sabata beat]
Before you die, you should know that those men with superior talents... and consequently with superior powers... always have one last card to play.
You know, Stengel, I wouldn't bet a dollar on that last card.
Hey, amigo! Who in hell are you, anyway?
When I stop laughin', you're dead.

[Said to Banjo, after he and Sabata had an armed confrontation]
Hey, amigo! That's Sabata... and you lost, eh?
